          "parent_id": "47408b41-7b4f-4392-a3bc-79fe552b4895",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "pushd \\\\myserver\\folder",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "bulleted_list",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "Forward slash ("
              ],
              [
                "/",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                ") often works when used instead of ("
              ],
              [
                "\\",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                ") but not always; it is normally used to mark switches (options). Using forward slash can lead to various obscure behaviors, and is best avoided."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "text",
          "version": 4
        }
      },

                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [

                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]

      "e7813958-f470-4c15-b6ea-19a298a7d246": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "content": [
            "df446dbe-fe62-40d9-85eb-d7f770e11856"
          ],
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_time": 1552534973312,
          "id": "e7813958-f470-4c15-b6ea-19a298a7d246",
